= Your Work Area =

Your work area will in:
 * ~\My Documents\My Games\Unreal Tournament 3\UTGame\Src\
-This your work area for your unreal script
 * ~\My Documents\My Games\Unreal Tournament 3\UTGame\Unpublished\CookedPC\
-This you .upk all for you package to be here.
 * ~\My Documents\My Games\Unreal Tournament 3\UTGame\Unpublished\CookedPC\Script\
-This is you .u file that where all your unreal script is complie.
 * ~\My Documents\My Games\Unreal Tournament 3\UTGame\Config\
-This is where your package name goes here.
